name: Luck of the Dungeoneer
description:
For the GMTK 2022 Game Jam - Roll of the Dice.

Journey through the dungeon and grab loot and fight skeletons. The better your rolls, the better the loot and higher the  damage!

Art, Programming, and Design by me.

Sound Effects and music sourced from https://freesound.org

Music by levelplane,  SFX by CaptainYulef, Topschool, and Flem0527.

Font is Alagard by Hewett Tsoi.
